import*as type from"../types";import{baseURL}from'../baseURL';//POST REQUEST FOR USER POST
export var authJoin=function authJoin(data){return function(dispatch){console.log('====================================');console.log(data);console.log('====================================');dispatch({type:type.DISABLE_INPUT_BTN,payload:true});baseURL.post('/auth/account/',data).then(function(resp){return dispatch({type:type.JOIN_US,payload:true});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch({type:type.ERROR_MESSAGE,payload:true});}).finally(function(){return dispatch({type:type.DISABLE_INPUT_BTN,payload:false});});};};
